Metadata.Title: 0sink junk Log Access to Cardholder Data

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 10.2.1

What to Do

Log all access to cardholder data.

How

Logging access to cardholder data should be implemented by the centralized log server solution. Configure the logging of access to cardholder data using the centralized server solution by following the vendor's instructions.
